mean_cn: n. 在职者，现任者；  adj. 现任的，依靠的，负有职责的
mean_en: a person who holds a particular office or position
word_etyma: in上 + cumb躺 + ent → incumbent 压在上面的，现任的，现任者
sentence: In an election, one advantage of being the incumbent is that people already know who you are.
sentence_trans: 在选举中，作为在职者的优势之一就是群众已经知道你了。
